DOC.brief_summary: An observational , non-interventional , multi-centre study provide information utility test predictive marker investigate current prevalence high sensitivity CRP ( hs-CRP ) test characteristic CVD risk group .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Into Correlation Plasma Hs-CRP Concentrations Cardiovascular Risk Korean Population
DOC.criteria: Subjects least one clinic visit record within last 12 month date data entry . Subjects least one hsCRP level measure within last 12 month date data entry . Use statins lipidlowering therapy include fibrates , niacin , bile acid sequestrants past 3 month prior hsCRP measurement Active inflammatory disease document period CRP measurement Subjects take immunosuppressant Findings chronic inflammation : arthritis , lupus , inflammatory bowel disease
